title: Hotel Reforma
provenance: Dealer: St. Jivago Desanges, P.O. Box 24 AA2, Los Angeles, CA 90024 (ph: 213/931-1984)
description: Round luggagel label with scattered images of a plane, steamship, train, automobile, and yellow hotel(?) within a narrow blue border. Text in black along upper curve of circle: HOTEL REFORMA; in small text below: THE PRIDE OF MEXICO . . . . MEXICO, D.F.
name: Print
